languages.text: "Никак нет, шерин, мне в последнее время не до хитроумных планов было, знаешь ли. Зато пока этот проклятый ашмаг гемункул, да пожрут ажи его костлявое тело да черную душу, ставил надо мной опыты, я у него из лаборатории парочку интересных вещичек умыкнула. Вот, держи, может и пригодится чего. Если не для побега, так хоть просто для выживания в этой вонючей дыре".

traits.locale_text: "Никак нет, шерин, мне в последнее время не до хитроумных планов было, знаешь ли. Зато пока этот проклятый ашмаг гемункул, да пожрут ажи его костлявое тело да черную душу, ставил надо мной опыты, я у него из лаборатории парочку интересных вещичек умыкнула. Вот, держи, может и пригодится чего. Если не для побега, так хоть просто для выживания в этой вонючей дыре".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "That's a negative, shereen. Hatching clever plans has been the last thing on my mind recently, you see. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."
languages.original_text: "Никак нет, шерин, мне в последнее время не до хитроумных планов было, знаешь ли. Зато пока этот проклятый ашмаг гемункул, да пожрут ажи его костлявое тело да черную душу, ставил надо мной опыты, я у него из лаборатории парочку интересных вещичек умыкнула. Вот, держи, может и пригодится чего. Если не для побега, так хоть просто для выживания в этой вонючей дыре".

traits.locale_text: "Negative, shereen, the clever plans were the last thing on my mind as I have been rather preoccupied. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour his scraggy body and the black soul — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. There you go, they may come in useful if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Negative, shereen, the clever plans were the last thing on my mind as I have been rather preoccupied. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour his scraggy body and the black soul — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. There you go, they may come in useful if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."

But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. traits.locale_text: "That's a negative, shereen. Hatching clever plans has been the last thing on my mind recently, you see. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我不清楚，亲爱的。如你所知，我最近最不想做的事情，就是策划巧妙的计划。不过好消息是，当那个混蛋血伶人忙着在我身上做实验的时候，我从他的实验室里偷走了几件小玩意儿。愿鬼怪吞了那个黑心混蛋的骨头。收下吧，这些东西可能会派上用场。就算没办法帮助我们逃跑，也可以帮我们在这个烂坑里活下来。”
languages.original_text: "That's a negative, shereen. Hatching clever plans has been the last thing on my mind recently, you see. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."

traits.locale_text: “我不清楚，亲爱的。如你所知，我最近最不想做的事情，就是策划巧妙的计划。不过好消息是，当那个混蛋血伶人忙着在我身上做实验的时候，我从他的实验室里偷走了几件小玩意儿。愿鬼怪吞了那个黑心混蛋的骨头。收下吧，这些东西可能会派上用场。就算没办法帮助我们逃跑，也可以帮我们在这个烂坑里活下来。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "That's a negative, shereen. Hatching clever plans has been the last thing on my mind recently, you see. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."

languages.text: «Negativo, shereen. Los planes astutos han tenido muy poca prioridad en mi mente estos últimos días, ¿sabe? Por otro lado, mientras ese Hemónculo ashmag, que los azhi devoren su alma negra, se entretenía experimentando conmigo, conseguí llevarme un par de cositas de su laboratorio. Tome. Espero que sean útiles, si no para escapar, al menos para sobrevivir en este agujero putrefacto».
languages.original_text: "That's a negative, shereen. Hatching clever plans has been the last thing on my mind recently, you see. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."

traits.locale_text: «Negativo, shereen. Los planes astutos han tenido muy poca prioridad en mi mente estos últimos días, ¿sabe? Por otro lado, mientras ese Hemónculo ashmag, que los azhi devoren su alma negra, se entretenía experimentando conmigo, conseguí llevarme un par de cositas de su laboratorio. Tome. Espero que sean útiles, si no para escapar, al menos para sobrevivir en este agujero putrefacto».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それは否定だね。賢明な計画を練るのは、最近ちょっと考えていたことなんだ。でもいい面もある。あのアッシュマグのハモンキュラス…アジーがあの黒い魂の袋を食い尽くさんことを…あたしに実験するのに忙しくしているときに、研究室から小物をいくつか盗んできたんだ。脱出するためでなくても、少なくともこの腐った穴の中で生き延びるためには役に立つはずよ」
languages.original_text: "That's a negative, shereen. Hatching clever plans has been the last thing on my mind recently, you see. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."

traits.locale_text: 「それは否定だね。賢明な計画を練るのは、最近ちょっと考えていたことなんだ。でもいい面もある。あのアッシュマグのハモンキュラス…アジーがあの黒い魂の袋を食い尽くさんことを…あたしに実験するのに忙しくしているときに、研究室から小物をいくつか盗んできたんだ。脱出するためでなくても、少なくともこの腐った穴の中で生き延びるためには役に立つはずよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Negativ, Shereen. Gerissene Pläne zu ersinnen, hatte bei mir in letzter Zeit sehr geringe Priorität,. Zumindest konnte ich aber ein paar Dinge aus seinem Laboratorium stehlen, während dieser Ashmag von Haemonculus seine Experimente an mir durchgeführt hat, mögen die Azhi diesen Fleischsack mit tiefschwarzer Seele verschlingen. Hier, sie könnten nützlich sein. Wenn nicht, um zu entkommen, dann zumindest, um in diesem Drecksloch zu überleben."
languages.original_text: "That's a negative, shereen. Hatching clever plans has been the last thing on my mind recently, you see. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."

traits.locale_text: "Negativ, Shereen. Gerissene Pläne zu ersinnen, hatte bei mir in letzter Zeit sehr geringe Priorität,. Zumindest konnte ich aber ein paar Dinge aus seinem Laboratorium stehlen, während dieser Ashmag von Haemonculus seine Experimente an mir durchgeführt hat, mögen die Azhi diesen Fleischsack mit tiefschwarzer Seele verschlingen. Hier, sie könnten nützlich sein. Wenn nicht, um zu entkommen, dann zumindest, um in diesem Drecksloch zu überleben."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Négatif, shereen. Je n'ai vraiment pas la tête à mettre au point des plans astucieux en ce moment. Mais voyons le bon côté des choses : pendant que cet ashmag d'hémoncule — que les azhi dévorent ce sac d'os à l'âme noire — était occupé à mener des expériences sur moi, j'ai réussi à voler quelques babioles dans son laboratoire. Tenez, elles pourraient se révéler utiles. Si elles ne nous permettent pas de nous échapper, elles pourraient au moins nous aider à survivre dans ce trou infâme. »
languages.original_text: "That's a negative, shereen. Hatching clever plans has been the last thing on my mind recently, you see. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."

traits.locale_text: « Négatif, shereen. Je n'ai vraiment pas la tête à mettre au point des plans astucieux en ce moment. Mais voyons le bon côté des choses : pendant que cet ashmag d'hémoncule — que les azhi dévorent ce sac d'os à l'âme noire — était occupé à mener des expériences sur moi, j'ai réussi à voler quelques babioles dans son laboratoire. Tenez, elles pourraient se révéler utiles. Si elles ne nous permettent pas de nous échapper, elles pourraient au moins nous aider à survivre dans ce trou infâme. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Olumsuz şirinim. Son zamanlarda zekice planlar kuramıyorum. İyi yanında bakalım... Şu azhi yiyesice, kara ruhlu kemik torbası, külboğaz Haimonkulus; üzerimde deneyler yapmakla meşgulken laboratuvarından bir iki şey kapmayı başardım. Al, belki bir işe yararlar. Kaçmamıza yaramasalar bile bu çürük delikte biraz daha hayatta kalmamızı sağlayabilirler."
languages.original_text: "That's a negative, shereen. Hatching clever plans has been the last thing on my mind recently, you see. But on the bright side, while that ashmag Haemonculus — may the azhi devour that black-souled bag of bones — was busy experimenting on me, I managed to nick a couple of trinkets from his laboratory. Here, they may come in useful, if not for escaping, then at least for surviving in this rotten hole."

traits.locale_text: "Olumsuz şirinim. Zekice planlar kurmak, son zamanlardaki asıl uğraşlarımdan biri sayılmaz. Olumlu taraftan bakacak olursak, azhi yiyesice şu kara ruhlu kemik torbası külboğaz Haimonkulus, benim üzerimde deneyler yapmakla meşgulken, laboratuvarından bir iki hediyelik eşya kapmayı başardım. Al, belki bir işe yararlar. Kaçmamıza yaramasalar bile belki bu çürük delikte biraz daha hayatta kalmamızı sağlarlar."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
